Aug. 9, 1930 D Bridgwater Band Festival (Open Championship)
Bridgwater Band Festival (Open Championship) 10 Test Piece Contest Bridgwater Band Festival bridgwater-band-festival-open-championship
The Merry Wives of Windsor [Nicolai]
Blake Gardens, Bridgwater, Somerset, England, UK Prizes: £20, £15, £10, £6. 6 bands competed.
Jan. 11, 2014, 4:34 p.m. Dec. 9, 2018, 12:51 p.m.
1 Glastonbury Brass J. B. Yorke
2 5th Batt. Welsh Regt. T.A. William Griffiths
3 Ferndale Thomas James Powell
4 Bridgwater Imperial J. B. Yorke
4 Keynsham Brass Band Herbert S. Perry
6 Kingswood YMCA A. Grivelle
